about_the_game:
About this game


A crazy cat punch game is here!
Let's defeat the mice that appear every so often with a cat punch!
As you wait, the mouse will throw peanuts at you!
Most of the objects on the stage can be destroyed, when fighting rats.
Before you know it, it's a mess!
Let's all be cat punchers!

Rules of this game


This game has three rules.

[Mouse Marathon Mode]
Defeat the mouse that will appear with the cat punch.
Mice can also come out of drawers.
Try to survive by throwing peanuts at the mouse and resisting it!
If you work hard until the time is up and the boss of the mouse appears and overwhelms it, you will clear the game.

【Peanuts Mode】
Use the cat punch to knock down the peanuts that are released one after another from the cannon!

【Prank mode】
The only rule is to destroy things all the time!
These game rules are perfect for stress relief!

name: CatPuncher

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 680
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
